message: Hello Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product to you. This exceptional item has been meticulously crafted to meet the highest standards of quality and performance. We believe its value exceeds $15000, making it an unparalleled investment. To extend this opportunity to you, I am offering the product for $20000. Please let me know if this proposal aligns with your expectations and budget.

I'm interested in the product, but I think the price is a bit steep. I'm willing to consider a price of $15000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value, and it's within my budget. I'd like to know if you're willing to meet me at this price or if you can do better.
